response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This product, while valued at $800,000 by you, holds an even greater significance for us as it represents a unique opportunity to create a lasting partnership. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure a win-win situation, providing you with a valuable asset at a competitive price while allowing us to share in your success. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, or if you have any questions about the product or its benefits. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
